title: Honor
body: Hi, I got lvl3 honor getting a lot of gg, but i flamed in 1 game and get restriction and 1 lvl of honor. I passed 10 games in restrcition, but I when will I get lvl 3 honor. Will i get lvl3 honor sudenly or i have to reach lvl2 honor? In my profile it is write that keep cool to back your rewards, but they mean i will get back 3lvl of honor or 2?

replies.body: Same thing happened to me, sorry to say they don't care, it won't matter what you do, produce those #'s and get people to "honor" you and you can re-attain that superficial title of Honor 3 and all its meaninglessness.
